comments.body: This include is now used in the SAS, Stata, and spreadsheet pages. Since spreadsheets don't have "vectorized operations" in the same way, took out this reference.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +-1,3 @@pandas provides vectorized operations by specifying the individual ``Series`` in the
``DataFrame``. New columns can be assigned in the same way. The :meth:`DataFrame.drop` method drops
a column from the ``DataFrame``.
